'''Companion Gift - "Freedom of Rock 'n' Roll"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Companion Gift - "Freedom of Rock 'n' Roll" is obtained from the [[Claw Convoy]] Event.
